    Class represents tha square that contains an ammo card
    Author:
    Evandro Maddes, Federico Innocente

      • checkAmmo

        public boolean checkAmmo()
        it checks if on the square there is an ammo or not
        Returns:
        true if the ammo isn't set to null, false in the other case

      • replaceAmmoTile

        public void replaceAmmoTile(AmmoTile ammoTileCard)
        if the BasicSquare doesn't have a ammo,it adds one; when an AmmoTile is replaced, notifies the observers
        Parameters:
        ammoTileCard - card that was drawn from AmmoTileDeck
